Submodules¶

gbj_pythonlib_hw.cputemp module¶

Module for measuring CPU (SoC) temperature.

class gbj_pythonlib_hw.cputemp.CpuTemperature[source]¶

Bases: object

Creating a CPU temperature manager.

  • All temperature values are expressed in float centigrades.
  • The microprocesor’s temperature sensor provides temperature resolution in millicentigrades, which is hardly the same measurement accuracy.
get_limit()[source]¶

Return CPU temperature limit or read it.

get_temp()[source]¶

Return CPU temperature measured recently in centigrades.

get_temp_perc()[source]¶

Return CPU temperature measured recently in percentage of limit.

measure()[source]¶

Measure and return current CPU temperature in centigrades.

measure_perc()[source]¶

Return current CPU temperature in percentage of limit.

perc2temp(percentage)[source]¶

Convert percentage of limit to centigrades.

temp2perc(temperature)[source]¶

Convert centigrades to percentage of limit.

gbj_pythonlib_hw.orangepi module¶

Module for controlling GPIOs of Orange Pi microcomputers.

  • The library orangepi_PC_gpio_pyH3 should be installed: https://github.com/duxingkei33/orangepi_PC_gpio_pyH3
  • For controlling in-built LEDs their control at the operating system level should be set to None.
